pages.text: The Allay Collector is a block that uses the power of the Allay to collect items in an area around it.$(br2) It has a range of 8 blocks in all directions, and will collect items within that range.$(br) When in the inventory it can also be used as a magnet. To obtain it, first you need to craft an Empty Personal Collector.

pages.title: Capturing an Allay
pages.text: Once you have the Empty Personal Collector, you need to capture an Allay. To do this, you need to find an Allay and use the Empty Personal Collector on it. This will capture the Allay into your Personal Allay Collector.
